Notes

Recorded at Castle Recording Company, Lake Geneva, Wisconsin, July 1982. © & ℗ 1982 Slash Records Lyrics © 1983 Gorno Music Publishing ASCAP Packaged with a custom printed inner sleeve featuring song lyrics. This second pressing uses stock Slash labels, unlike the first pressing which has uniquely designed "two-tone" labels.
